document_data.name: ''Gauntlets of Ogre Size''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gauntlets of ogre size''''' were magic [[gauntlets]] of truly [[ogre]] proportions of both positive and negative enchantments.
document_data.Description: ''Gauntlets of ogre size'' were noticeably oversized gauntlets, of much bigger size than that of a [[human]] hand.
document_data.Powers: These enormous gloves increased the wearer's defenses but made them significantly easy to hit.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], a pair of ''gauntlets of ogre size'' was in the possession of a [[dark naga]] that could be found in its lair in the tomb under the [[House Ammath]] mansion in [[Glim-Gardens]] of [[Myth Drannor]], a part of [[Dwarven Dungeons]]. The gauntlets, along with the ''[[boots of the tortoise]]'' and [[Alaric's charm]] were locked in naga's chests.
